website_summaries.verdict: Although not as easily absorbed as more concentrated forms, this affordable option still offers considerable benefits and is well tolerated by most.
pros: Promotes healthy cholesterol levels and supports liver function
Users report that consistent use noticeably improves cognitive function
Stacked with inositol for elevated mood, reduced anxiety, and circulatory health
Free of preservatives, milk, wheat, soy, and sugar
cons: Not as easily or rapidly absorbed as Alpha GPC or CDP choline

customer_reviews.title: Losing Weight
customer_reviews.text: Gives my wife some gas, but she is losing a lot of weight and water. Just drink more water, when using them. I think the are removing bad stuff in her system, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by Psychiatrist
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughter and I have taken this supplement. My daughter's psych recommended this supplement during her pregnancy as a possible preventative to ADHD/Biopolar in her baby based on a study from the University of Colorado. You can also buy baby formula and cereal with Choline added. The inositol ... Antiphospholipid Syndrome / Lupus Anticoagulant often causes miscarriages as your own body's attack fat/cholesterol causing clotting. I personally, developed pulmonary embolisms. I notice when my cholesterol is elevated, my symptoms worsen. If nothing else, this supplement goes a long way to keep us both calmduring stressful times.
customer_reviews.author: Married Female 40, 3 kids 20 15 2

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried sunflower lecithin, and all that did was add weight to my belly. I have also have tried another Choline and Inositol by a local retailer which was literally 2.5 times the price of this one, and this one works just as good (or better) than that one. Good brand, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I remember.
customer_reviews.text: When I was studding Anatomy & Physiology the professor told the class that this product helps with keeping your memory. I have been taking this a long time now and I'm very glad. I think it has helped me remembering the smallest detail of episodes I experienced when I was young.. I personally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: El Hombre

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I'm really trying to lose a considerable amount of weight with diet and with supplements. After a LOT of research and study, I've discovered that my needs were not being met. These supplements are really making a difference for me. Thanks PurePremium!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Rusch

customer_reviews.title: Good for constipation
customer_reviews.text: I've had chronic constipation my entire life. I've tried everything including probiotics and enemas this product was the solution, don't get confused for the bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: David Osorio

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping
customer_reviews.text: I really think this stuff is helping me. I'm only taking one pill a day for about 3 weeks now. I definitely noticed a difference in my ability to focus. I'm also having some very Vivid dreams since I started taking this. I've never been able to remember dreams so this is odd but not bad. I'm considering taking it up to the recommended two pills per day soon to see if I can get the full benefit.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: What you see is not what you get...
customer_reviews.text: We’ll see if/how it works but for starters what you see is not what you get - see pics. Short of paying a lab to analyze actual contents (and purity) you have no way of knowing whether what they say is in the pills is actually in them.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: A Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have taken Choline/Inositol for years for liver support. I did take the 500 mg each but they were tablets and hard to swallow due to the size. I just take two of these capsules every morning and they go down easily. The mix is also good for hair and nails. Nature's Way is a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: TXSenora

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty good..
customer_reviews.text: (I'm the wife) I'm taking this to help with PCOS and so far it seems to be helping, regular about like clockwork and I've even lost weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Increased mental clarity....Amazing memory formula, and anti anxiety pill.
customer_reviews.text: Increased mental clarity.....Amazing. Very pleased with this amino acid...Hoping it will take down my cholesterol levels....Time will tell.

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for keeping you head
customer_reviews.text: Great product to offset headaches brought on by extreme concentration.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: These really help clear my morning fog. I take this with ubiquinol and krill oil and feel alert and mentally sharp all day.

customer_reviews.title: Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I reorder this all the time. There such a big difference in my body. And the I side just feels so clean. Me and my husband both love it.

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement.
customer_reviews.text: Great! Exactly what I was wanting to combat ADHD symptoms naturally. I can tell when I don’t take it. Much more focused when I use it. Take with black pepper and vitamin B complex for better absorption.

customer_reviews.title: Seems good.
customer_reviews.text: I think I eat slightly less with these, but who knows?

customer_reviews.title: Helps with ADHD Symptoms and emotional wellbeing

customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Hard to say how a product like this works, but it come just as described.

customer_reviews.text: These caps may aid in the digestion of fats. They may also be healthy for liver and kidneys and the production of thyroid hormones.

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to anyone's brain stack
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really gets me in the zone in the mornings. If I had a little less sleep then I normally do, I can't even notice after taking this. Definite a great addition to anyone's nootropic stack, I think I will keep this as a permanent addition to my stack.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent supplement!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a light sleeper and already on menopausal stage this supplement helps me sleep good making my day better. I tried other natural sleep meds before but this one is the best! The product arrived earlier than expected. Thanks! I would recommend it highly to those who are undergoing the same conditions I have.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Lombard

customer_reviews.title: Capsule are large.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product and several other natural products and walking more so I am not sure if it was this product that did it but I have dropped my blood pressure thirteen points without taking medication and feel much better.

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: This supplement made me feel worse. I think it might have to do with other meds I take though. I'm not going to purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far as I know. Seems to have helped my memory.
customer_reviews.author: CentrallyLocated

customer_reviews.title: CAN CAUSE EXTREME FATIGUE
customer_reviews.text: Made me so tired I could barely stand up or drive myself home. BE WARNED: THESE CAN CAUSE EXTREME FATIGUE IN SOME PEOPLE. Now, if you are taking this for insomnia, I would still recommend taking these in limited amounts. I took one or two servings and was KNOCKED OUT for almost a week. I had to hide these so I don't accidentally take them again. If you're taking this for anxiety, maybe you can open the capsule and use a half serving in some tea. I don't recommend taking a full serving unless you are used to this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: love it .
customer_reviews.text: BP lowering is difficult with blood altering drugs but this stuff helps a bunch

customer_reviews.text: It didn't make much difference in how I felt, so I stopped taking it after a while. Still, it didn't cause any problems either.

customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice any effects what-so-ever after a month of taking this. I'll file this choline buzz under the hokum and snake-oil chicanery that my instincts said it would be. I was taking 2g (2 pills every 4 hours) a day. No noticeable effect.

customer_reviews.text: Doesn't help me in any way.i wonder if it really works.

customer_reviews.text: IT IS GOOD I GUESS ......... I BROUGHT IT FOR THE PRODUCTION OF SPERM. I PLAN TO MAKE A LOT OF HEALTHY BABIES IN THE FUTURE.
customer_reviews.author: Andre T. -- S.I., N.Y.

customer_reviews.title: My entirely personal non-placebo anecdotal post surgery experience...they helped.
customer_reviews.text: I understand less and less as I get older, but after my surgery, I just felt I wasn't recovering...energy felt yukky, I was cranky. Years ago, I used to take this regularly. Two pills per day. I happened to see a bottle not out of date in the cabinet, and within an hour, felt usually restored. It wasn't a placebo event as I popped these two pills with no expectation at all. I was just cleaning out a closet and said, oh well, I'll paid for them. Grateful they were there.
customer_reviews.author: Reality Wins

customer_reviews.title: Helps with constipation!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed after three days I get a good bowel movement. Before taking these, I didn't feel satisfied after going for the toilet. Choline + Inositol really helped me to eliminate my gut better. Its tied to feeling clear headed. You won't have clear focus if your gut is full of Sh!t. So makes sense that this supplement first makes you eliminate gut wastes before you get a clear mind. You might feel some detoxification symptoms such as gut problems and tiredness if you have a gut full of Sh!t
customer_reviews.author: Abdallah I. Idris

customer_reviews.title: Good for nerve function and memory
customer_reviews.text: My husband is taking this for his peripheral neuropathy, and it is helping a lot. I'd say he's 80% better. Gabapentin and neurotin was what doctors gave him, and they did nothing at all. He is 69 and was experiencing some memory problems. Now, he's beating me at scrabble again!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for panic attacks
customer_reviews.text: Depression runs in my family and the Choline and Inositol help me control my panic attacks! Love this produce.

I am full of energy but sometimes the stressors are overwhelming..I found this through a review..and it has been very good for me..I hope it can help other people too..to effectively calm themselves..without any side effects.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I take it with my b-complex. Choline is good for the liver, from what I have read.

customer_reviews.title: I've noticed that while taking these my seasonal allergy symptoms ...
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed that while taking these my seasonal allergy symptoms are alleviated. When my eyes and sinus start getting itchy I know I've forgotten to take them. These seem to provide my body with something it needs to get through Spring hay fever season without a whole lot of antihistamines and tissues. I'm not sure how it is helping but I can feel a difference.

customer_reviews.text: This is not the kind of item that you can determine its effect in a short period of time. I have used Inositol for over 40 years and it has kept any neuropathy associated with my diabetes at bay. I have only used this brand for a few months, it seems to be ok.

I take this for muscularity, 2 caps with meals. I have had no negative side effects and would buy again. This product does not have a safety cap and it does open up easy.

customer_reviews.title: Had to do some math to realize this is a good deal

When I determined how many milligrams of Inositol and Choline I take daily I found that purchasing this combo was actually little more economical for me even though the price per bottle seems high. I paid fourteen sixty eight with free shipping through amazon as the supplier and I am very pleased with this product. It was my first time trying this particular brand, Nature's Way, and I like it very much. If you already take these supplements then you know this is going to be a horsepill no matter what brand you try.

customer_reviews.title: I received it with the top cap sitting cockeyed with ...
customer_reviews.text: I received it with the top cap sitting cockeyed with two of the bottle threads showing. The shrink wrap was in place though so I thought I'd try it out. Didn't want to go through the whole return thing. Anyway, used a couple times, felt nauseous (most likely psychosomatic) and quit using. Will probably buy again but gave the 1Star because Quality Control.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine
customer_reviews.text: I take choline because I can't eat eggs and because liver if eaten more than about once a week (4 ozs.) can be toxic due to possible copper overload, for one. Anyway, this is what the "experts" I choose to believe say. So, a choline supplement seems like a good idea. Is it doing its job? I don't know. I suffer no ill effects from it, at least outrightly. If I haven't kicked the bucket in ten years or so, I could give an update.
customer_reviews.author: Skids

product_meta.title: Nature's Way Choline and Inositol, 1,000 mg per serving, 100 Capsules
product_meta.description:
Choline Inositol 500mg 100 CapsuleProduct Description

Choline and Inositol help maintain cellular efficiency, proper nerve function and metabolism of fats and HDL (good) cholesterol. This product contains crystalline inositol and choline bound to tartaric acid for superior absorption.
feature_bullets: BRAIN HEALTH & CELLULAR ENERGY.* With 1,000 mg choline and inositol per serving.
RESPONSIBLE PACKAGING. Bottle made with 97% post-consumer recycled materials. Please recycle.
GLUTEN-FREE. No sugar, salt, yeast-derived ingredients, wheat, dairy, or artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives.
